author: Simon Difford
description: A mojito topped with champagne instead of soda water. There's posh.
name: Royal Mojito
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Add first 4 ingredients to glass and two-thirds fill with crushed ice
CHURN (stir) with bar spoon and then FILL glass with more crushed ice
